name: Naruto Uzumaki
description: A ninja of the Hidden Leaf Village, striving to become Hokage.

name: Gaara
description: The Fifth Kazekage of the Hidden Sand Village.

name: Shikamaru Nara
description: A strategic genius from the Nara clan.

name: Sasuke Uchiha
description: Naruto's rival, a talented ninja from the Uchiha clan.

name: Hinata Hyuga
description: A kind-hearted ninja from the Hyuga clan.

name: Tsunade
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and the Fifth Hokage.

name: Rock Lee
description: A taijutsu specialist with unbreakable determination.

name: Deidara
description: A rogue ninja who specializes in explosive art.

name: Madara Uchiha
description: A legendary ninja and co-founder of the Hidden Leaf Village.

name: Kakashi Hatake
description: The leader of Team 7, known as the Copy Ninja.

name: Ino Yamanaka
description: A member of the Yamanaka clan specializing in mind techniques.

name: Pain (Nagato)
description: Leader of Akatsuki, wields the Rinnegan and seeks peace through pain.
jutsus: Summoning: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

name: Hidan
description: An immortal Akatsuki member who worships Jashin.
jutsus: Curse Technique: Death Controlling Possessed Blood

name: Sakura Haruno
description: A skilled medical ninja and member of Team 7.

name: Itachi Uchiha
description: Sasuke's elder brother, a genius of the Uchiha clan.

name: Kisame Hoshigaki
description: The Monster of the Hidden Mist, partnered with Itachi.

name: Orochimaru
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and a master of forbidden techniques.

name: Temari
description: A skilled kunoichi from the Sand Village.

name: Neji Hyuga
description: A prodigy of the Hyuga clan.

name: Killer Bee
description: The Jinchuriki of the Eight-Tails and a master rapper.

name: Kakuzu
description: A bounty hunter with multiple hearts and mastery of all chakra natures.

name: Tsunade
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and the Fifth Hokage.

name: Konan
description: Nagato's loyal partner, known for her Paper Jutsu.

name: Hashirama Senju
description: The First Hokage and co-founder of the Hidden Leaf Village.

name: Choji Akimichi
description: A member of the Akimichi clan with great physical strength.

name: Zetsu
description: A plant-like being with White Zetsu and Black Zetsu halves.

name: Jiraiya
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and Naruto's mentor.

name: Sasori
description: A puppet master from the Hidden Sand, known for his human puppets.

name: Obito Uchiha (Tobi)
description: A former Uchiha clan member who manipulates events from the shadows.

name: Kiba Inuzuka
description: A ninja with a strong bond with his dog, Akamaru.
